docs.snippet: AUSTIN, Texas, July 2--A warning that the United States must be free to act in a war emergency in this hemisphere, without involvement with any other nation, was sounded today at the opening session of the Institute of Latin-American Studies by Dana...
docs.lead_paragraph: AUSTIN, Texas, July 2--A warning that the United States must be free to act in a war emergency in this hemisphere, without involvement with any other nation, was sounded today at the opening session of the Institute of Latin-American Studies by Dana G. Munro, director of public and international affairis at Princeton University.

headline.main: DEMANDS WE HAVE FREEDOM IN CRISIS; Munro Warns of Involvement if Latin America Hinders Us in War Emergency TRADE TREATIES PRAISED Grady at Texas Meeting Calls Them Economic Defense Against Totalitarianism

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, July 2 --The United States cruisers Wichita and Quincy, under command of Rear Admiral A.C. Pickens, will leave here tomorrow bound northward for an unannounced destination. It is reported their first call will be at Rio Grande do...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, July 2 --The United States cruisers Wichita and Quincy, under command of Rear Admiral A.C. Pickens, will leave here tomorrow bound northward for an unannounced destination. It is reported their first call will be at Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil.
docs.abstract: Wichita and Quincy to leave Uruguay; Phoenix arrives at C Z en route to Chile

headline.main: U.S. WARSHIPS TO SAIL FROM URUGUAY TODAY; Their Presence Has Strengthened Public Demand for Nazi Curb
